focusedAbilities.desc: At the end of your turn, you gain 2 Chaos Tokens.
At the start of each enemy turn, you may Pull yourself up to X spaces towards the active character, where X is the number of Chaos Tokens you hold.

fusedAbilities.desc: At the end of your turn, you gain 1 Chaos Token.
At the start of each enemy turn, you may Pull yourself up to X spaces towards the active character, where X is the number of Chaos Tokens you hold.

franticAbilities.desc: At the end of this turn, you gain 2 Chaos Tokens.
Until your next turn, at the start of each enemy turn, you may Pull yourself up to X spaces towards the active character, where X is the number of Chaos Tokens you hold.

actions.name: Devil Dive
actions.desc: Teleport 3, then deal 2 damage to an enemy within range.

alphaSuper.name: Unending Despair
alphaSuper.desc: Target an adjacent enemy. Give them 4 Burning tokens, 3 Fatigue tokens, and 2 Weakness tokens. You gain 2 Iron tokens, 2 Power tokens, 2 Speed tokens, and 2 Chaos tokens.

deltaSuper.name: Dancing Mad
deltaSuper.desc: Teleport 3, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent enemy. You may repeat this as many times as you like. After you damage the same enemy twice, you deal 1 damage to all enemies within Range 1-3, then this Super Move ends.
